title: What is best, RCM or Vestige? - Quora

response.answer_text: Both are Direct Selling companies and I have analysed the businesses of both in quiet details. The extract is as follows : - Vestige is a bigger brand.Vestige has a bigger consumer base.RCM product development cycle is better. Itis at par with international standards.RCM is the fastest growing Direct Selling company in entire Asia.While vestige product’s packaging quality is better, The product quality of RCM Products is far better.Both have a distributor training program. But RCM relies more on competence development and personal development.Both have good feedback systems. Customer care of each should improve further.The biggest difference is in the VALUE PROPOSITION. RCM is clearly the winner in this aspect owing to its superior quality and economic pricing.Business plans of both companies give good income.RCM has a broader business strategy and it is very easy for a new joinee to execute.Both companies have nutritional products, but RCM’s Nutricharge products are far superior and effective. Also Nutricharge products are economic and most are clinically tested and certified.Harsh Jain

RCM focuses on Fast moving consumable goods and health products on nominal rates with best and original quality . RCM is producing most of its products by its own. RCM is distributing income on the basis of its product sale and not on the basis of joinings.Vestige selling cheap goods on high rates. It is a kind of money rotation behind the name of direct selling. RCM is much better and more trustable Direct selling company than Vestige. RCM is better in respect of no. of products and no. of delivery centres.
